mapper.select:
select mid mid,tid tid,username username, mtitle mtitle, mcontent mcontent, mtime mtime, mstate mstate, mlastreply mlastreply from bbs_message
limit #{pageBeginIndex},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into bbs_message (tid, username, mtitle, mcontent, mtime, mstate, mlastreply) values (#{tid}, #{username},#{mtitle}, #{mcontent}, now(), 0, now())
